testCases.name: User Login Functionality
testCases.description: Verify that users with different roles (Admin, Staff, Customer) can log in successfully.
steps: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid Admin credentials (admin@printshop.com / admin123)
Verify redirection to Admin Dashboard
Log out
Enter valid Customer credentials (alice.johnson@example.com / password123)
Verify redirection to Customer Portal
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users are authenticated and redirected to their respective dashboards based on role.
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails with valid credentials or user is redirected to the wrong dashboard.

testCases.name: Service Catalog Browsing
testCases.description: Verify that services are displayed correctly from the database.
steps: Navigate to the Services page
Check if categories (e.g., Business Printing, Signage) are visible
Click on a category to filter services
Select a specific service (e.g., Business Cards)
Verify service details, options (Quantity, Finish), and pricing are displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Service catalog is populated with data from the 'services' table and options are interactive.
testCases.failureCondition: Services page is empty or service details do not match the seed data.

testCases.name: Quote Request Process
testCases.description: Test the end-to-end flow of a customer requesting a quote.
steps: Log in as a Customer
Select a service
Configure service options (e.g., 500 count, Matte finish)
Submit the quote request
Navigate to 'My Quotes' section
Verify the new quote appears with status 'SUBMITTED'
testCases.expectedOutcome: Quote is successfully created in the 'quotes' table and visible in the customer dashboard.
testCases.failureCondition: Quote submission fails or the created quote is not listed.

testCases.name: Responsive UI Test
testCases.description: Ensure the application layout adapts to mobile and desktop screens.
steps: Open application on desktop view
Resize browser window to mobile width (< 768px)
Verify navigation menu collapses into a hamburger menu
Check that product cards stack vertically
Ensure no horizontal scrolling is required for content
testCases.expectedOutcome: UI adapts fluidly between breakpoints without breaking layout or functionality.

testCases.name: Gallery Content Verification
testCases.description: Verify that the gallery displays images and descriptions.
steps: Navigate to the Gallery page
Verify that multiple images are loaded
Check for titles and descriptions (e.g., 'Premium Business Cards')
Click on an image to view details or larger version
testCases.expectedOutcome: Gallery is populated with seed data images and text.
